nodes.text: A large creature was native to the planet Kullgroon and had red skin. Lando Calrissian and his droid companion L3-37 were escaping the Wastelands Of Kullgroon on the Millennium  Falcon when the creature came out from the ground and tried to swallow the starship. A worried Lando tried to get L3 to kill the creature but she refused to do so as a second creature also appeared and tried to swallow them. Lando and L3 managed to escape the creatures.
